1.text: Preheat the oven to 325 °F (163 °C) and melt the butter.

2.text: Toss the pecans with the butter and spread them on a baking sheet.

3.text: Bake the pecans for 25 minutes and stir them at the halfway point.

4.text: Remove the sheet and season the pecans with salt and red pepper.

5.text: Cool the pecans on the baking sheet.

6.text: Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat.

7.text: Stir in the pecans, salt, and red pepper.

8.text: Cook the pecans for 2 to 5 minutes and stir them frequently.

9.text: Transfer the pecans to a plate and cool them completely.

10.text: Mix the butter, pecans, salt, and pepper in a dish.

12.text: Heat the pecans for 1 to 2 minutes and stir them every 30 seconds.

13.text: Cool the pecans before you use them.
